General.Name: Sarthak Metals Limited
General.Description: Sarthak Metals Limited manufactures, sells, and exports cored wires, ferro alloys, aluminum wires, industrial gases, and related products in India and internationally. The company offers calcium silicide, calcium iron, calcium solid, calcium aluminium iron, lead, ferro titanium, ferro titanium, carbon, ferro boron, magnesium ferrosilicon, nitride manganese, and ferro niobium wires, as well as aluminum flipping coils. It also offers wire feeder machines for drawing wires. The company serves steel manufacturing companies. Sarthak Metals Limited was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Bhilai, India.

3.Name: Mr. Sanjay Chamanlal Shah
3.Title: Head of Sales & Marketing and Whole Time Director
